data.name: The Game of Life 2 - Lunar Age
data.detailed_description:
When you’re done finding success in the eco green cityscapes, there are more worlds to explore in THE GAME OF LIFE 2!

Launch into the brand new Lunar Age! Experience a futuristic time of adventure and discovery, where pegs build a society on the moon and live among extraterrestrials.

Grow through life, from the Moon Base to a Biodome City and beyond, until you reach an Advanced Alien Civilisation! Dress up as an Astronaut, choose the Robot Suit, or rock the Retro Futuristic style. Graduate from the Lunar Academy, stay single or meet your one true love and get married in a dome with an Earth view. Adopt a pet, have a baby, become a Blackhole Explorer, and meet the aliens!

The choices are all yours on the furthest frontier!

Join your friends and family for a journey into the future you’ll never forget!

data.short_description: Launch into THE GAME OF LIFE 2 Lunar Age! Experience a world of adventure and discovery. Build your life in orbit, from the Moon Base to the Biodome City, all the way to the Advanced Alien Civilisation! The choices are all yours on the furthest frontier!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz single core processor
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 class GPU [1280 x 720]
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
